articles.title: Crisis-hit Pakistan strikes $3bn funding deal with IMF - BBC
articles.description: The South Asian nation is facing its worst economic crisis since independence from Britain in 1947.
articles.content:
Crisis-hit Pakistan has reached a staff-level agreement with the International Monetary Fund (IMF) over $3bn (£2.4bn) of funding.
The deal, which still needs to be approved by the global lender's bo… [+2379 chars]

articles.author: Navdeep Singh
articles.title: Fri-yay on D-Street! Sensex, Nifty hit fresh record highs on robust US data - Economic Times
articles.description: From the Sensex pack, Power Grid and Asian Paints were the top gainers, rising 2-3%. Infosys, Tata Motors, Titan, Wipro, Bajaj Finance, and IndusInd Bank rose in early trade. On the flip side, only, Tata Steel, Nestle, and ICICI Bank traded with cuts.
articles.content: Indian equity markets opened at a fresh record high on Friday on improved sentiment following robust economic data from the US, which eased fears of a slowdown. Buying was seen across all major secto… [+3721 chars]
